movie.title: THX 1138
movie.description: In this sci-fi thriller, George Lucas shows you a grim distopic future in which people are named with letter-number designations, and their personalities are dampened with mandatory medication to make them complacent. Then, THX 1138, played by Robert Duvall, fights back.

movie.title: Spirited Away
movie.description: Get lost in Miyazaki's deliciously rich fantasy world where a little girl, Chihiro, is trapped in an alternate world where she is forced to work at a bath house for spirits and deities in order to get back home to her parents.

movie.title: Fruitvale Station
movie.description: A damn tragic true story, only watch if you are ready to cry for a few hours afterward.

movie.title: Best Of Enemies
movie.description: A Great documentary about the televised debates at the 1968 RNC and DNC between Gore Vidal and William F. Buckley, Jr.
